Actions.Name: Date/Time Countdown
Actions.Tooltip: Count down to a specific time or date/time

Actions.Name: Focus Timer
Actions.Tooltip: Use work/break alternating timings to manage your time and get things done

Actions.Name: Stream Timer
Actions.Tooltip: Set a timer on your Stream Deck, and have it shown on your Stream too

Author: BarRaider
Description:
Set a timer on your Stream Deck, and have it shown on your Stream too. Will start flashing in a color of your choice when the time is up.Includes sound support & Streamathon mode (increase/decrease the time left on every key press)
New: Focus Timer - Alternate between work & break cycles to mange your time and get things done.
Name: Stream Countdown Timer
